snippet.title: Falos Quick Trailer
snippet.description:
🌍 Welcome to Falos: The Full Version! 🎮

Learn over 100+ words in 100+ languages while having fun! 🌟

4 Game Modes:

    Gorilla Jumper 🦍: Jump to the right emojis to match words!
    Dragon Snake 🐍: Guide your character to the right emojis, but watch out for your tail!
    Bird 🐦: Fly and dive through the correct emojis to match the words!
    Endless Gorilla Runner 🦍🏃: Keep jumping and collect the right emojis in an endless adventure!

Learn new words, play different modes, and explore languages in a fun way! 🌟

Falos can be found on Steam

✨ Get ready to jump, fly, and learn in Falos! ✨
